description:
Lana`s Popplio is Lana`s main Pokémon. Ashimari swims at a speed of forty kilometers per hour and its superb swimming speed really shocked Ash when he first saw it swim.
It participated in the third Alola! Surprise! verses Pikachu which was a Pokémon Aquathlon, where the Pokémon compete in both swimming and running. After starting off slow in the running segment and falling behind Pikachu, it quickly made up the difference and quickly passed Pikachu when it got into the water and it won the challenge.
name: Ashimari (Suiren)
